{1: 'I thought there was good rapport between us.'}
{1: 'I also enjoy walking with you, Bianca.'}
{1: 'Even if we are to do it again, we still need to finish this road first.'}
{1: 'You mean we have the same goal?'}
{1: 'According to the maze instructions, it should take us to the stage in front.'}
{1: "Don't you like this kind of activity?"}
{1: 'I just hope this place makes you happy.'}
{1: '...And design more trainings to enhance overall tactical coordination...'}
{1: 'You also did a great job working with me.'}
{1: "We probably won't find anything like that."}
{1: 'I guess this was what "battle" in the Golden Age felt like.'}
{1: 'Maybe that sort of festival would be called a "food festival" instead of Valentine\'s Day.'}
{1: 'We used to train together after all.'}
{1: 'Do you have facilities like this in Kowloong?'}
{1: "It's just a place for people who successfully clear the maze"}
{1: 'You seem to really like this place.'}
{1: 'What, did you meet a fake Commandant just now?'}
{1: "I don't mind it as an occasional entertainment."}
{1: 'I just wanted to explore the maze with you.'}
{1: 'We had synergy because you were also minding me.'}
{1: "I guess that's not a coincidence then."}
{1: 'Alright. Now that we have cleared the maze...'}
{1: 'What do you think of this maze, Bambinata?'}
{1: 'It takes two to get out of this maze.'}
